languages.text: "Не думаю, что противники Тисифоны так легко примут правду о случившемся здесь. Пусть я и узрел все своими глазами, пусть и увидел в Дитя надежду на будущее, отличное от правление Тисифоны. Я постараюсь убедить своих единомышленников дать Леди Кассии шанс, ибо Дом Орселлио станет вдвое сильнее, если вновь воссоединится".

traits.locale_text: "Не думаю, что противники Тисифоны так легко примут правду о случившемся здесь. Пусть я и узрел все своими глазами, пусть и увидел в Дитя надежду на будущее, отличное от правление Тисифоны. Я постараюсь убедить своих единомышленников дать Леди Кассии шанс, ибо Дом Орселлио станет вдвое сильнее, если вновь воссоединится".

languages.text: "I don't think that it will be easy for Tisiphone's opponents to accept the truth of what transpired here, even though I saw it for myself, saw in the Child a hope for the future and a reign that was not Tisiphone's. I will strive to convince my associates to give Lady Cassia a chance, for a reunited House Orsellio will grow twice as strong."
languages.original_text: "Не думаю, что противники Тисифоны так легко примут правду о случившемся здесь. Пусть я и узрел все своими глазами, пусть и увидел в Дитя надежду на будущее, отличное от правление Тисифоны. Я постараюсь убедить своих единомышленников дать Леди Кассии шанс, ибо Дом Орселлио станет вдвое сильнее, если вновь воссоединится".

traits.locale_text: "I don't think that it will be easy for Tisiphone's opponents to accept the truth of what transpired here, even though I saw it with my own eyes, saw in the Child a hope for the future and a reign that was not Tisiphone's. I will strive to convince my associates to give Lady Cassia a chance, for a reunited House Orsellio will grow twice as strong."

languages.text: 「ここで起きた真実をティシフォンの敵対勢力が受け入れるのは難しいと思います。この目で見た私自身ですらそうなのですから。未来への希望とティシフォンとは異なる治世が、御子の中に見えたなんて。私はレディ・カシアに機会を与えるよう、全力で仲間を説得します。再び一丸となったオーセリオ家は一段と強くなるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "I don't think that it will be easy for Tisiphone's opponents to accept the truth of what transpired here, even though I saw it for myself, saw in the Child a hope for the future and a reign that was not Tisiphone's. I will strive to convince my associates to give Lady Cassia a chance, for a reunited House Orsellio will grow twice as strong."

traits.locale_text: 「ここで起きた真実をティシフォンの敵対勢力が受け入れるのは難しいと思います。この目で見た私自身ですらそうなのですから。未来への希望とティシフォンとは異なる治世が、御子の中に見えたなんて。私はレディ・カシアに機会を与えるよう、全力で仲間を説得します。再び一丸となったオーセリオ家は一段と強くなるでしょう」

languages.text: “尽管我亲眼见证了这里的一切，也在圣子身上见到了未来的希望，但提西福涅那些反对者恐怕不会轻易接受这里发生的事情。我会努力说服我的同僚，让他们给卡西娅女士一个机会，因为只要奥赛罗家族团结起来，就会变得比以往更加强大。”
languages.original_text: "I don't think that it will be easy for Tisiphone's opponents to accept the truth of what transpired here, even though I saw it for myself, saw in the Child a hope for the future and a reign that was not Tisiphone's. I will strive to convince my associates to give Lady Cassia a chance, for a reunited House Orsellio will grow twice as strong."

traits.locale_text: “尽管我亲眼见证了这里的一切，也在圣子身上见到了未来的希望，但提西福涅那些反对者恐怕不会轻易接受这里发生的事情。我会努力说服我的同僚，让他们给卡西娅女士一个机会，因为只要奥塞罗家族团结起来，就会变得比以往更加强大。”

languages.text: « Même si je l'ai vu de mes propres yeux, et même si je peux maintenant affirmer que l'Enfant représente le meilleur espoir pour l'avenir de notre maison, les opposants de Tisiphone risquent d'avoir du mal à accepter la vérité sur ce qui s'est produit ici. Je ferais néanmoins de mon mieux pour convaincre mes associés de donner une chance à dame Cassia, car pour véritablement prospérer, la maison Orsellio doit s'unir. »
languages.original_text: "I don't think that it will be easy for Tisiphone's opponents to accept the truth of what transpired here, even though I saw it for myself, saw in the Child a hope for the future and a reign that was not Tisiphone's. I will strive to convince my associates to give Lady Cassia a chance, for a reunited House Orsellio will grow twice as strong."

traits.locale_text: « Même si je l'ai vu de mes propres yeux, et même si je peux maintenant affirmer que l'enfant représente le meilleur espoir pour l'avenir de notre maison, les opposants de Tisiphone risquent d'avoir du mal à accepter la vérité sur ce qui s'est produit ici. Je ferais néanmoins de mon mieux pour convaincre mes associés de donner une chance à dame Cassia, car pour véritablement prospérer, la maison Orsellio doit s'unir. »

languages.text: «No creo que sea fácil para los oponentes de Tisiphone aceptar la verdad de lo ocurrido aquí, a pesar de que yo he visto con mis propios ojos la esperanza de un futuro con la niña, una casa muy distinta a la de Tisiphone. Haré lo posible por convencer a mis socios para que den una oportunidad a lady Cassia, pues una casa Orsellio reunida será el doble de fuerte».
languages.original_text: "I don't think that it will be easy for Tisiphone's opponents to accept the truth of what transpired here, even though I saw it for myself, saw in the Child a hope for the future and a reign that was not Tisiphone's. I will strive to convince my associates to give Lady Cassia a chance, for a reunited House Orsellio will grow twice as strong."

traits.locale_text: «No creo que sea fácil para los oponentes de Tisiphone aceptar la verdad de lo ocurrido aquí, a pesar de que yo he visto con mis propios ojos la esperanza de un futuro con la niña, una casa muy distinta a la de Tisiphone. Haré lo posible por convencer a mis socios para que den una oportunidad a lady Cassia, pues una casa Orsellio reunida será el doble de fuerte».

languages.text: "Es wird Tisiphones Gegnern nicht leichtfallen, die Wahrheit über das hier Geschehene zu akzeptieren. Obwohl ich es selbst gesehen habe. In dem Kind eine Hoffnung für die Zukunft gesehen und eine Herrschaft, die nicht Tisiphones war. Ich werde mich bemühen, meine Partner zu überzeugen, Lady Cassia eine Chance zu geben. Denn ein wiedervereintes Haus Orsellio wird doppelt so stark sein."
languages.original_text: "I don't think that it will be easy for Tisiphone's opponents to accept the truth of what transpired here, even though I saw it for myself, saw in the Child a hope for the future and a reign that was not Tisiphone's. I will strive to convince my associates to give Lady Cassia a chance, for a reunited House Orsellio will grow twice as strong."

traits.locale_text: "Es wird Tisiphones Gegnern nicht leichtfallen, die Wahrheit über das hier Geschehene zu akzeptieren. Obwohl ich es selbst gesehen habe. In dem Kind eine Hoffnung für die Zukunft gesehen und eine Herrschaft, die nicht Tisiphones war. Ich werde mich bemühen, meine Partner zu überzeugen, Lady Cassia eine Chance zu geben. Denn ein wiedervereintes Haus Orsellio wird doppelt so stark sein."

languages.text: "Kendi gözlerimle gördüğümden Çocuk'un gelecek için umut ve Tisiphone'ninkinden farklı bir hükümdarlık vadettiğini biliyorum. Yine de Tisiphone'nin düşmanlarının, burada olup bitenlerin aslını kabul etmesi kolay olmayacak. Yandaşlarımı Leydi Cassia'ya fırsat tanımaları için ikna etmeye gayret edeceğim. Sonuçta Orsellio Hanesi, birliğini yeniden sağlayabilirse iki kat daha güçlü büyür."
languages.original_text: "I don't think that it will be easy for Tisiphone's opponents to accept the truth of what transpired here, even though I saw it for myself, saw in the Child a hope for the future and a reign that was not Tisiphone's. I will strive to convince my associates to give Lady Cassia a chance, for a reunited House Orsellio will grow twice as strong."

traits.locale_text: "Kendi gözlerimle gördüğüm için, Çocuk'un gelecek için bir umut ve Tisiphone'ninkinden farklı bir hükümdarlık vadettiğini biliyorum. Yine de Tisiphone'nin düşmanlarının burada olup bitenlerin aslını kabul etmesi kolay olmayacak. Yandaşlarımı Leydi Cassia'ya bir fırsat tanımaları için ikna etmeye gayret edeceğim. Sonuçta Orsellio Hanesi, yeniden birleşirse iki kat daha güçlü büyür."
